org.hornetq.jms.client

Class HornetQMessageProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hornetq.jms.client.HornetQMessageProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, javax.jms.MessageProducer, javax.jms.QueueSender, javax.jms.TopicPublisher

    public class HornetQMessageProducer
extends Object
implements javax.jms.MessageProducer, javax.jms.QueueSender, javax.jms.TopicPublisher
    HornetQ implementation of a JMS MessageProducer.
    Author:
    Ovidiu Feodorov, Tim Fox, Andy Taylor
